title: Saiyuuki Reload Gunlock (Saiyuki Gunlock)
synopsis: The Sanzo Ikkou continues its westward journey, on a mission to prevent a demonic resurrection. As Genjo Sanzo, Cho Hakkai, Sha Gojyo, and Son Goku fight their way to their goal, their path is fraught with internal strife. When they encounter a formidable pair of adversaries from the west, the cohesion of the group -- and the fate of the mission -- may be at stake.
characters: ['Genjou, Sanzou', 'Son, Gokuu', 'Cho, Hakkai', 'Sha, Gojou', 'Kougaiji', 'Jianyi, Ni', 'Koumyou, Sanzo', 'Lirin', 'Jeep', 'Bosatsu, Kanzeon']
